events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it did not fit as expected. I would like to return it and get a refund for the amount paid.
The system has detected keywords related to refunds and returns and classified this case accordingly.
The case was assigned to customer support agent Lisa for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. I'll be happy to assist you today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product is unused and in original packaging for the return?
My order number is 9832746, and the jacket is still in its original packaging and hasn't been worn or damaged.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund process. Please use the prepaid return label we'll send you shortly to ship the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back soon.
Your refund case is now open and will be finalized once we receive your return. We are here if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm whether you have sent the jacket back and if you require any further assistance with your refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation.
